posts.title: Finding Your Purpose in Your 20s
posts.content:
Most people go through a time in life, specifically in their 20s, where they struggle to find their purpose in life. Whether it's trying out several jobs, traveling the world, or just experiencing as many new things as possible - all of these things can help broaden your horizons and make you find a clearer purpose.

posts.title: Where I Grew Up
posts.content:
Growing up in Orange County was a great experience. With a melting pot of different people and cultures, living here as a kid made me into the person I am today. There are a lot of differences between California and where I'm currently living, Denver, CO. Denver is a wonderful place to live as well, but there definitely is a lot less diversity here.

posts.title: What "Being Basic" Really Means
posts.content:
Being basic generally has a negative connotation to it. However, it shouldn't be viewed in such a negative light. Whether you have your daily cup of Starbucks in hand,  a warm and stylish scarf around your neck, or thick-brimmed glasses on, being basic is a lifestyle.
